Text.Page:
I've been watching you. I'm definitely impressed. Skilled, clever, and not bad-looking at all.

What's a nice like you doing in a place like this?

You'd never make it through the front doors. The Sinestral Manor is irritatingly hard to enter. On the other hand, I don't believe in "can't."

Want to get inside?

(Parties of three or more required.)Sinestral ManorEnter the Manor
